name: places/ChIJMzHFI3P3wokRPRStDK4Hoxg
formattedAddress: 320 E 109th St, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 320 E 109th St, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text: This was the first time getting a sew in in years! As soon as I walked in, I was greeted & welcomed with a smile. Immediately brought to the shampoo bowl & I had a wonderful scalp scrub! Three shampoos & a deep conditioner with steam treatment. My stylist Khadijah was super gentle and transparent throughout the process. She took her time & styled my hair with confidence. I miss feeling like I'm being pampered in a salon. She offered all the necessary services to ensure that my hair was healthy and beautiful. I also love that the shampoo, steam treatment & hair were all included in her packages. She has hair on hand! This was 22" layered with big curls for body. I will be back & the other stylist in the salon do amazing work as well!

originalText.text:
Siddityy Hair Studio is the closest thing to Heaven right now! Khadijah’s work and professionalism is impeccable. She also has amazing staff. The atmosphere was welcoming as well as calming. Cleanliness is also a contributing factor to the 5 stars (from the front bench all the way to the bathroom)

Lastly but definitely not least, Khadijah styled my hair in a classy Half up Half down style. She performed with patient, delicacy and care. Overall amazing experience. If I could give it 10 stars I would. Thank you Khadijah

originalText.text: My experience was flawless. I was nervous about trying a new salon/ stylist & I had questions about my hair health. Khadijah was gentle, patient & informative. I got a silk press on 4c hair & this is the silkiest my hair has ever been. She did great. I’ll be going back for Microlinks soon.

text.text: My experience was flawless. I was nervous about trying a new salon/ stylist & I had questions about my hair health. Khadijah was gentle, patient & informative. I got a silk press on 4c hair & this is the silkiest my hair has ever been. She did great. I’ll be going back for Microlinks soon.

originalText.text: Traveled from Irvington NJ to get my hair done by Master Stylist Khadijah & let me just say phenomenal service. From the wash to the install, to the vibe and ambiance of the salon. 10/10. I got a Natural Sew-In which I love. I also purchased the hair from her 10/10! Highly recommend & I will be back.

text.text: Traveled from Irvington NJ to get my hair done by Master Stylist Khadijah & let me just say phenomenal service. From the wash to the install, to the vibe and ambiance of the salon. 10/10. I got a Natural Sew-In which I love. I also purchased the hair from her 10/10! Highly recommend & I will be back.

originalText.text: My initial appointment included a color consultation. During this visit, I wasn’t greeted when I entered but the stylist was “nice” once I sat down. That day I scheduled an appointment for about 2.5/3 weeks out. I was getting my hair done for my birthday, and I was leaving NY the next day. My appointment was scheduled for a Wednesday. On Tuesday morning the stylist texted me. Her initial conversation consisted of confirming the style and color that I wanted to get. I didn’t think anything of that. She then proceeded to ask me if I could come 3 hours earlier than my initial appointment and I informed her that I could not. She then canceled my appointment and stated that there was an issue with the water. I expressed my frustration as this was my “birthday hair” (if it was any other day I wouldn’t care) and I had to find someone else to do my hair, with 24 hour notice. I did let her know that I understood she could not control the water issue but I did not appreciate the short notice and how things went. I also didn’t even get my deposit back for the inconvenience. I’m particularly upset bc I have been searching for a natural hair stylist and thought that I had found the perfect fit. But nah, canceling my appointment for my birthday hair and not trying to rectify was too much for me.
